name: VEENA & NEENA PRINT FOILS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Connecting unknown photographers to the world of opportunities

One of the biggest challenges for photographers is to find opportunities in the industry. Pixean is addressing the issue by channelising the opportunity directly to photographers. Pixean is enabling a match making engine to recommend relevant photographers to the customer requirements. Not only limiting up to the opportunities to these photographers, but Pixean envision to educate, inspire and recognize photographers by means of playing as ecosystem.

Pixean is currently a platform with about 100,000 photographers from 120 cities in India. Pixean is presently providing services in 30+ cities in India. Pixean has its team working from three different cities - Navi Mumbai, Kanpur, Gurgaon.
name: OKSBIRD ONLINE SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED
